alert.note: Alert for Howell; Oregon; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 10:36PM CST until March 06 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CST FOR SHANNON...HOWELL AND CENTRAL OREGON COUNTIES... At 1035 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Summersville to 8 miles west of Eminence to Birch Tree to 6 miles south of West Plains, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Plains... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Echo Bluff State Park... Mountain View... Winona... Alton... Birch Tree... Eminence... South Fork... Koshkonong... Brandsville... Montier... Thomasville... Teresita... Midridge... Pottersville... Rover... Round Spring... Peace Valley... Alley Spring... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
